messages.subject: Re: Studies on Food control
messages.msgSnippet: LOVED this video!! I have always felt the need to NOT push food on my dd - even when we weren t officially radical unschoolers. My family is all about clear
messages.messageBody:
LOVED this video!!
I have always felt the need to NOT push food on my dd - even when we weren't officially radical unschoolers. My family is all about 'clear your plate before you get dessert'.
I forwarded this to most of my family, kinda as a 'see-I'm-not-crazy' kinda thing. LMAO!
Made so much sense and very informative.
Thanks for posting it.

Brandi




--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, BRIAN POLIKOWSKY <polykowholsteins@...> wrote:
>
> We unschoolers have been saying all these all along about limiting food and cleaning plates.
> These are studies on it: ( eye opening)
>

>
>  
> Alex Polikowsky
> http://polykow.blogspot.com/
